name: LightStrafe - Online
description:
LightStrafe - Online is a fun 3D platformer with shooting mechanics made in Armory 3D. It is open source and still pre-alpha.

Controls:

WASD to move

Spacebar to jump

Hold RgtClick to aim

Left click to fire

GitLab: https://playlso.page.link/git

Website: https://playlso.page.link/site

Bleeding edge (depreciated): https://playlso.page.link/dev
